channel.title: 9/11 Conspirator is not sentenced to death
channel.description:
Zacharias Masawi is the only person to be arrested for the 9/11 attacks. His death penalty trial took place a few days ago. He was sentenced to life in jail, by a jury made up of 12 of his peers. If he had been placed in a military tribunal and tried as an enemy combatant, he would have been quickly publicly executed.
Interestingly, he said wanted to be killed. Then, when he was let off, he said America had lost and he had won. 0/12 of the jury said that his wish to be executed played a role in their decision, and 9/12 of the jury said that they were influenced by the racism that Masawi had experienced as a child.
Discuss.

item.title: 9/11 Conspirator is not sentenced to death
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

The middle east is a region, not a country.
Every country in the middle east is considered third world.
Not really. There country is rich in natural resources, they just choose to fight eachother, as they have for thousands of years and will continue to do for thousands more.
Do you think sunnis and shiates would be fighting each other if the US did not invade iraq? The country is rich in natural resources which are mostly exported. 40% of the profit goes to a royal family or leader while the rest of the money goes to the government which is barely enough to support the people
Our countries fiscal situation can be quickly reversed. During Clintons presidency, we were asking "What are we going to do with the surplus?". Besides, it doesn't make a difference whether we have money or not, we can always just print some more out of the national mint; it's not backed up by gold anymore. Hence, any debt we have is imaginary anyway.
Does that give you an excuse to spread your beloved democracy? I have nothing against democracy infact i support it but i say the war had nothing to do with democracy. Yet that does not seem to prove that The mid eastern countries are controlling the US
Yeah, all the Arabs you see driving around in Rolls Royces and shooting their collecters edition Benelli shotgun in the air earned all their money some other way than oil. Probably high alching sand.

The middle east isn’t as you describe it. People there work the butts off all day to earn scrap money. Ans where do you see these arabs driving around?

item.title: 9/11 Conspirator is not sentenced to death
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

the arabs are controlling you? Thats why the middle east is a thrid world country.

The middle east is a region, not a country.

Many people can barely eat everyday while you guys are orried whether or not you can fill your car up with petrol to move while theres many alternatives.

Not only do many people have trouble getting enough to eat everyday, 30,000 children starve to death every day. I would gladly use an alternative to oil if possible, and support candidates for office that want energy reform, hence I’m doing all I can as a US citizen.

People in the middle east are so poor

Not really. There country is rich in natural resources, they just choose to fight eachother, as they have for thousands of years and will continue to do for thousands more.

yet they are controlling the strongeest country in the world? With a debt that the US has i dont think they would be fighting to spread their beloved democracy.

Our countries fiscal situation can be quickly reversed. During Clintons presidency, we were asking “What are we going to do with the surplus?”. Besides, it doesn’t make a difference whether we have money or not, we can always just print some more out of the national mint; it’s not backed up by gold anymore. Hence, any debt we have is imaginary anyway.

The only people benefiting form the oil in the mid east are the leaders and the US and other countries.

Yeah, all the Arabs you see driving around in Rolls Royces and shooting their collecters edition Benelli shotgun in the air earned all their money some other way than oil. Probably high alching sand.

item.title: 9/11 Conspirator is not sentenced to death
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“Arkanor, post:48, topic:2386”]The day is coming when the oil deposits of the Middle East will be exhausted, and that entire region with the exception of Israel will collapse like a dwarf star back into the howling barbarism whence it came.

Let us hope that that day not be too long delayed.[/quote]

Let me elaborate on that. assuming your american (sorry if your not) u goto war in the middle east to pump out as much oil as possible. Then You cant wait till the day that the oil will finsh over there. Why? oh sorry did i say u went to the middle east for oil? i meant democracy silly me :s…
[br][size=1]Posted at: May 17, 2006, 05:06:44 am[/size][hr][quote=“PaulT, post:45, topic:2386”][quote]
Sorry to say but gas would have happened anyway, those Arabs control us. Everyone says we went to war for oil… ok… then WHY THE FUCK AREN’T WE GETTING ANY?! If we had really gone to war for oil, don’t you think we would have cleaned them out by now? Seriously. Bush i fell is a weanie and I love to spew opinions, so break out some more for me to talk about… LOL
[/quote]

the arabs are controlling you? Thats why the middle east is a thrid world country. Many people can barely eat everyday while you guys are orried whether or not you can fill your car up with petrol to move while theres many alternatives. People in the middle east are so poor yet they are controlling the strongeest country in the world? With a debt that the US has i dont think they would be fighting to spread their beloved democracy. The only people benefiting form the oil in the mid east are the leaders and the US and other countries.
We are getting oil. Oil prices in the US are lower than anywhere else in the world. I agree, the Arabs control us and it’s Bush’s (and every president for the past 25+ years) fault. We could switch to other fuels (for example, Brazil has completely stopped being dependent on foreign fuels…they use some kind of corn oil), but since they cost slightly more in the short term we don’t.

Personally I would pay 5$ a gallon if I knew I wasn’t supporting those crazy arab fucks.[/quote]

item.title: 9/11 Conspirator is not sentenced to death
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Chris, give up. I am learning never to discuss politics with people on the internet, because when people can remain anonymous they are free to be as radical as they please, and won’t back down because they have nothing to lose.

Xerxes may or may not be a dumbass. That’s irrelevant to this debate. The point is that he’s not going to change his views no matter what you tell him, and you aren’t going to change your views (or at least I hope you won’t). So, you two guys are going to butt heads, and this debate will degenerate into flaming. As it is, we are now debating whether or not the US is responsible for 9/11, not whether the conspirator deserved to die or not. So it’s already off topic.

Read full topic

item.source: 9/11 Conspirator is not sentenced to death

item.title: 9/11 Conspirator is not sentenced to death
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Firstly, the movies are biased. They are made by nothing more than liberal extremeists that do anything to try and bring down governments. Secondly, The site I provided you with is based around the films about all the nonsense. I can currently answer these questions:

Your question -
Btw, all these “US didn’t do 9/11” is made by people who like Bush. So what you say is pure bullshit. there were no fkn terrorist, how the hell could the Twin towers burn and explode just like that when it gets hit by a plane? Either it had to be bombs in the Twin towers, or it was not a plane. Maybe a missile.

Ok, well, I live in the UK. I do not support, nor do I hate Bush. In my life, Bush plays no role, therefore I have no feelings for him.

Secondly, I take it you have seen footage of the attack. You saw a plane flying in to the center. Now, the first thing you will say is, “it has a bulge on the bottom, that surely suggests something?” As I explained in my earlier post, the clearest picture taken on that day was sent to a photo analysist. He explained that what you were seeing was merely the landing gear box which was exagerated by the light. Of course, we have no real proof of this. Then again, you have no proof it was a missile. The next thing you will say is “There was a light coming from the plane seconds before the plane hit. That was a missle being fired.” I don’t understand, how you
can come to that conclusion just by seeing a white light. That light could of meant many o’ things. It can of been sunlight catching the metallic surface of the plane. It could be reflection of light coming from a world trade center window. If it was a missle, why did nothing come out of the plane before the impact. The next thing you may say is “It went right through the building, with an explosion coming out of the other end.” Now, really think about this. A plane hitting a building at 300+ Mph, it is bound to come through.

You also say there were bombs planted. First thing is, how does someone plant bombs without arrousing suspiscion? Out of the thousands i that center at the time, why wasn’t a bomb seen? How does someone get in; plant the bombs, and get out without a citizen getting suspiscious. Now, apparently, it was the same building take down as a planned demolished building. Think about it. The plane hit roughly 3/4 of the way up. Now thats maybe a few thousand tonnes resting on a damaged part. The preassure from the 1/4 left must of pushed so hard on the damaged area, it had to give way. The force from that taking down the rest of the buidling. No one ever came to the conclusion that fire burned it down.

And, if this was a conspiracy. Think of the many thousands of people who had to of haved knowledge on it. It just doesn’t add up to a conspiracy.

I have watched those films and I did understand where the writers were coming from. No matter what, there is always going to be a conspiracy. Most of the conspiracies made up by Liberal Extremeists.

Xerxes, I have nothing against you. I just don’t want you to fall for the same thing I did. I am 14 years of age and am ready to believe anything. My brother always used to pull pranks on me making me believe shit. I am very gullable. Although I am only 14 and you may be a few years older than me, please don’t take me for an idiot.

I feel like ending the discussion as it is not going anywhere. I say we agree to disagree. Please don’t say anything like “I owned you”, or any crap like that. I’m just simply not willing to carry on this conversation.

Well, thanks for reading mate. Have a good day

Read full topic
item.source: 9/11 Conspirator is not sentenced to death

item.title: 9/11 Conspirator is not sentenced to death
item.dc:creator: @Xerxes Xerxes
item.description:
@Xerxes wrote:

I have no doubts Bush and his mates planned this. Yet, you came up with 2-3 points that I hardly talked about…I guess… respond to my questions, watch the film or whatever.

Btw, all these “US didn’t do 9/11” is made by people who like Bush. So what you say is pure bullshit. there were no fkn terrorist, how the hell could the Twin towers burn and explode just like that when it gets hit by a plane? Either it had to be bombs in the Twin towers, or it was not a plane. Maybe a missile.

I read about a couple buildings who was on fire for like 24 hours or more, and those buildings was older, and it didnt explode nor fall down or whatever.

Man, just use your brain and you will understand the truth.

Answer my questions, look at the movie and answer those questions and then I may believe you that US didn’t do it, kthx.

And the logic is very clear:
All those leaders have been trained not to give a damn about the people. Atleast thats what I think.
They are ready to kill thousands of people, to accomplish what their want - I have no idea why they could have done it, whoever a couple reasons: War with Iraq, Iran, Afganistan and other countries, even Bush himself said World War 3 has started. A idea like this was brought to Kennedy, and he denied it all. So, why you telling me this wouldn’t happen?

etc etc I could write forever but I am lazy now.

Answer my questions, the films questions and I may believe you.

And you know, a profit they get from this? Bushs family, or Dick Cheneys corporations that sells guns, or deals with oil etc.

http://www.americanprogress.org/site/pp.asp?c=biJRJ8OVF&b=23898
http://www.halliburtonwatch.org/

I am glad to discuss this however not in a idiotish way.
